trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Moore
There were no other sightings in Moore on or around August 25th 2011
divs: sighting detailswent outside at 2:30 a.m. auguust 25, 2011 to catch my breath after a coughing fit. walked to end of my sidewalk to the east and a brillant light caught my eye at about 45 degrees. it appeared to be about the size of 1\2 inch next to my index finger. this is the flight path of tinker afb in midwest city, ok so i expected it to be one of the many planes i sight in daytime and nighttime. light was totally still so i figured it was flying toward me. i put my finger up to site it and it stayed the same size, not moving at all. it remained in the same position the entire 10 minutes i was outside. in about 1 minute 2 very small lights appeared next to the bottom of it and began making random, impossible flight manouveres all around the stationery object. one small object was bright red, one was bright blue. they didn't stay together, rather they moved all about up to the appearance of a couple inches around the stationery object. i went into the house to get a camera, but could only find my phone camera which takes bad pictures. i went outside to snap some pics fully expecting it to be gone since it had taken at least a couple minutes to find the phone. i took pics of the red and blue objects, but wouldn't take a pic of the stationery one. i tried over and over to no avail. suddenly the bright light was gone with only the blue and red ones left, then after a few seconds they too disappeared. no sound was made by anything including frogs, crickets etc. it was totally windless. i didn't hear the usual road traffic off i-35 or i-240. it was like i had muffs on my ears.
